title: 103_s340
content: The Act may be cited as the "Animal Medicinal Drug Use Clarification Act of 1994". It addresses unapproved uses of animal medicinal drugs. The "Animal Medicinal Drug Use Clarification Act of 1994" amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to exempt new animal drugs from certain requirements if used under a licensed veterinarian's order within a veterinarian-client-patient relationship and in compliance with Secretary's regulations. The Secretary may establish conditions for different use of animal drugs, with regulations prohibiting certain uses and requiring safe residue levels if a risk to public health is found. The Secretary may establish safe residue levels for animal drugs to prevent unsafe use, with the authority to access veterinarians' records and prohibit risky drug uses. The Secretary can establish safe residue levels for animal drugs to prevent unsafe use, with the authority to access veterinarians' records and prohibit risky drug uses. Amendments to the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act exempt approved drugs from certain requirements if used by a licensed veterinarian in compliance with regulations. The Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act is being amended to include new provisions related to drug use authorization and compliance with regulations. The Secretary of Health and Human Services is required to establish regulations within two years of the Act's enactment. The Secretary of Health and Human Services will create regulations to implement specific sections of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act. The amendments will come into effect once the final regulations are adopted. SEC. 3. MAPLE SYRUP. Preemption of State standards for maple syrup under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act is amended to exclude certain requirements related to maple syrup identity and quality standards set by States or political subdivisions. Amendment to the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act excludes certain state requirements for maple syrup identity and quality standards. The curr_chunk is about the roles of the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the Vice President of the United States as President of the Senate.
